name: Spiderman
author: Marvel
summary: Member of the Avengers, formerly member of Outlaws, alternate Fantastic Four

name: Batman
author: DC
summary: Batman Family, Batman Incorporated, Justice League, Outsiders, Wayne Enterprises, Club of Heroes, formerly White Lantern Corps, Sinestro Corps

name: Songoku
author: Akira Toriyama
summary: Son Goku is a fictional character and the star of the Dragon Ball manga series created by Akira Toriyama. Serving as the main protagonist of the series

name: Songohan
author: Akira Toriyama
summary: Son Gohan is a fictional character and the star of the Dragon Ball manga series created by Akira Toriyama. Serving as the son of the main protagonist of the series

name: Seiya
author: Masami Kurumada
summary: Seiya, is a fictional character in the Saint Seiya manga series created by Masami Kurumada. He is the eponymous protagonist who makes his debut in the first chapter The Saints of Athenas

name: Thor
author: Marvel
summary: King of Asgard; formerly EMS Technician; Physician
